resources.string: This App lets you send a siting of potentially illegal trawling activing to Ghana Government agency, Fisheries Enforcement Unit (FEU). Make a new report: take a picture of the boat, filling in as much info as you can.
Contact the FEU to report illegal trawling: use this app, OR SMS #12345, website: ghanaFEU.gh, call toll free 12 34 56 78.
